title: Alcohol: the first decision
creator_credit: King Screen Productions and Don Dickerson
brief_description: Surveys what young people are confronted with when deciding whether or not to drink, including seeing their parents drink, seeing advertisements for liquor in newspapers, magazines, and on billboards, and hearing alcoholism made a subject for levity on radio and television.
description: Surveys what young people are confronted with when deciding whether or not to drink, including seeing their parents drink, seeing advertisements for liquor in newspapers, magazines, and on billboards, and hearing alcoholism made a subject for levity on radio and television.
